Detailed Description

Generate random number from various distribution methods.

<glm/gtc/random.hpp> need to be included to use these functionalities.

Function Documentation

Definition at line 83 of file random.inl.

References glm::linearRand(), glm::log(), and glm::sqrt().

00087         {
00088                 genType w, x1, x2;
00089         
00090                 do
00091                 {
00092                         x1 = linearRand(genType(-1), genType(1));
00093                         x2 = linearRand(genType(-1), genType(1));
00094                 
00095                         w = x1 * x1 + x2 * x2;
00096                 } while(w > genType(1));
00097         
00098                 return x2 * Deviation * Deviation * sqrt((genType(-2) * log(w)) / w) + Mean;
00099         }
